reviewText: PLEASE! I would love to have a Russell Brand Collection: (like) Menage A Trois - 3 DVD Box Set (Ponderland / Russell Brand: Doing Life -Live / Russell Brand: Scandalous Live at the 02 Arena)in a USA playable format. PLEASE!

The concept of Russel Brandt is hilarious just thinking about it. Well done, hardly repeated any of his routines in thr whole 3 discs. Impressed. His comments were all pre marrying Katy Perry, but still quite humerous thining "if only you knew"

I do not ordinarily write reviews like this, or for these kinds of products, but I would really like to see these dvd's released on a format that is playable here in the United States.

I suppose the first thing I should do is try to give this review at least the semblance of legitimacy by saying something about the product. Despite the fact that I have been unable to watch the two live discs on this set since they have not been released on region 1 I have watched most of Ponderland on youtube and it is hilarious. Russell Brand is a genius in more ways than one and if you enjoy stand up comedy I highly suggest giving him a try. The problem on youtube is that the sound is not always aligned right with the picture which is why these dvd's need to be released on a format that is playable here in the United States for all of Russell Brand's fans here. There are quite a few of us and I suggest we attempt to make our voices heard! So, who's with me???

The DVD set was in perfect shape, so I'll rate that a five! Sucks that I can't play it in a United States DVD player and it was noted in the description of the product, however, I wish it would have been more clearly stated. THIS WILL NOT PLAY FOR YOU, MY FELLOW AMERICANS!The Russell Brand Collection: Menage A Trois - 3-DVD Box Set ( Ponderland / Russell Brand: Doing Life - Live / Russell Brand: Live ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 2 Import - United Kingdom ]
